trans-unit.source: Represents a security token handler that creates security tokens from SAML 2.0 Assertions.
trans-unit.target: 表示會從 SAML 2.0 判斷提示建立安全性權杖的安全性權杖處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler> class serializes and deserializes security tokens backed by SAML 2.0 Assertions into <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler>類別序列化和還原序列化安全性權杖的 SAML 2.0 判斷提示到<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken>物件。

trans-unit.source: Security token handlers are responsible for creating, reading, writing, and validating tokens.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖處理常式負責建立、 讀取、 寫入和驗證權杖。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a security token service (STS) or relying party (RP) application to process SAML 2.0 Assertion-backed security tokens by adding an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler> class to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection> object configured for the service (or application).
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定安全性權杖服務 (STS) 或信賴憑證者 (RP) 應用程式處理 SAML 2.0 判斷提示為基礎的安全性權杖所加入的執行個體<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler>類別<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection>設定服務 （或應用程式） 的物件。

trans-unit.source: This can be done either programmatically or in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這可以透過程式設計方式或在組態檔中完成。

trans-unit.source: The handler itself is configured from the configuration specified for the collection through the collection’s <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection.Configuration%2A> property when it is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合的集合針對指定的設定會設定處理常式本身<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection.Configuration%2A>屬性加入至集合時。

trans-unit.source: While it is possible to configure the handler individually by setting its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property, this is not normally necessary; however, if the handler must be configured individually, the property should be set after the handler is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以藉由設定個別設定的處理常式其<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>屬性，這不是通常需要; 不過，如果處理常式必須在個別的設定，屬性應設定之後，處理常式加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: For many scenarios, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler> class can be used as-is; however, the class provides many extension points through the methods it exposes.
trans-unit.target: 以許多情形來說<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler>類別可用來當做-; 不過，這個類別會提供許多擴充點透過方法它公開。

trans-unit.source: By deriving from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler> and overriding specific methods, you can modify the functionality of the token processing provided in the default implementation, or you can add processing for extensions to the SAML Assertion specification that may be needed in some custom scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler>和覆寫特定方法時，您可以修改的預設實作中，在提供的權杖處理功能，或加入可能需要在 Saml 規格的延伸模組的處理某些自訂的情況。

A collection of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Attribute" /> that contains the attributes generated from claims.
trans-unit.target: 包含宣告所產生之屬性的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Attribute" /> 型別集合。

trans-unit.source: Collects attributes with a common claim type, claim value type, and original issuer into a single attribute with multiple values.
trans-unit.target: 將具有一般宣告型別、宣告實值型別及原始簽發者的屬性收集到有多個值的單一屬性。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Attribute" /> that contains attributes derived from the input collection.
trans-unit.target: 包含衍生自輸入集合之屬性的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Attribute" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Attributes in the input collection that share a common claim type, claim value, and original issuer with other attributes are consolidated into a single attribute with multiple values in the output collection.
trans-unit.target: 在輸入集合中與其他屬性共用通用宣告型別、宣告或原始簽發者的屬性會在輸出集合中合併成具有多個值的單一屬性。

trans-unit.source: Attributes in the input collection that do not share claim type, claim value, or original issuer with other attributes appear unaltered in the output collection.
trans-unit.target: 輸入集合中不與其他屬性共用宣告型別、宣告或原始簽發者的屬性會照舊出現在輸出集合中，沒有變更。

trans-unit.source: The subject of the <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> (the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject" /> property) contains claims with a claim type of either <see cref="F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationInstant" /> or <see cref="F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationMethod" /> but does not contain at least one claim of each type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> (<see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject" /> 屬性) 的主旨包含宣告，其宣告類型為 <see cref="F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationInstant" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationMethod" />，但沒有每個類型至少包含一個宣告。

trans-unit.source: The handler is not configured or an issuer name registry is not configured for the handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個處理常式並未設定，或未針對此處理常式設定簽發者名稱登錄。

trans-unit.source: (The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> property is <see langword="null" /> or is set to a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration" /> with an <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.IssuerNameRegistry" /> property that is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The issuer name returned by the configured issuer name registry for the security token (<paramref name="samlToken" />) is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖 (<paramref name="samlToken" />) 的已設定的簽發者名稱登錄傳回的簽發者名稱為 <see langword="null" /> 或空白。

trans-unit.source: The lifetime of the token.
The endpoint address for which the token is created.
trans-unit.target: 要為其建立權杖的端點位址。

trans-unit.source: The address is modeled as an AudienceRestriction condition.
trans-unit.target: 將位址模式化 AudienceRestriction 條件。

trans-unit.source: The token descriptor.
Creates the conditions for the assertion.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions" /> object that contains the conditions for the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 包含判斷提示條件的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Generally, conditions should be included in assertions to limit the impact of misuse of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，條件應該包含在限制的誤用，判斷提示之影響的判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions can limit the period of vulnerability in the case of a compromised assertion.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 條件可以限制的弱點可能會在受到危害的判斷提示的情況下的期間。

trans-unit.source: The AudienceRestrictionCondition can be used to explicitly state the intended relying party or parties of the assertion, which coupled with appropriate audience restriction enforcement at relying parties can help to mitigate spoofing attacks between relying parties.
trans-unit.target: AudienceRestrictionCondition 可用來明確指定預定的信賴憑證者合作對象，或判斷提示，搭配適當的對象限制強制在信賴憑證者的合作對象之合作對象可以幫助減輕信賴憑證者之間的詐騙攻擊合作對象。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A> property of the `tokenDescriptor`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會建立為基礎的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 條件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A>屬性`tokenDescriptor`。

trans-unit.source: It will also generate an AudienceRestrictionCondition limiting consumption of the assertion to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A> property of the `tokenDescriptor`.
trans-unit.target: 它也會產生限制的判斷提示來取用 AudienceRestrictionCondition<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A>屬性`tokenDescriptor`。

trans-unit.source: The token descriptor from which to create the name identifier.
trans-unit.target: 權杖描述元，要從其中建立名稱識別項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a name identifier that identifies the assertion issuer.
trans-unit.target: 建立識別判斷提示簽發者的名稱識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier" /> that represents the name identifier.
SAML2 assertions must contain a name identifier for the issuer.
trans-unit.target: SAML2 判斷提示必須包含簽發者的名稱識別項。

trans-unit.source: This method may not return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可能不會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates a simple name identifier from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.TokenIssuerName%2A> property of the `tokenDescriptor`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會建立簡單名稱識別項從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.TokenIssuerName%2A>屬性`tokenDescriptor`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The security token descriptor from which to create the subject.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖描述元，要從其中建立新的主體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a SAML 2.0 subject for the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 建立判斷提示的 SAML 2.0 主題。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject" /> that represents the subject of the assertion.
<paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The SAML token.
A value that indicates whether an attached or unattached reference should be created.
trans-unit.target: 表示應建立附加的還是未附加的參考的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates the security token reference when the token is not attached to the message.
trans-unit.target: 建立權杖未附加至訊息時的安全性權杖參考。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that represents the token reference.
(An instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AssertionKeyIdentifierClause" /> is actually returned.)

The token descriptor from which to create the statements.
trans-unit.target: 權杖描述元，要從其中建立陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Creates SAML 2.0 statements to be included in the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 建立要包含在判斷提示中的 SAML 2.0 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Statement" /> that contains the statements.
trans-unit.target: 包含陳述式之 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Statement" /> 的列舉。

trans-unit.source: Statements are not required in a SAML 2.0 assertion.
trans-unit.target: 陳述式並不需要在 SAML 2.0 判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: This method may return an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可能會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The token descriptor from which to create the security token.
trans-unit.target: 權杖描述元，要從其中建立安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Creates a security token based on a token descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 以權杖描述元為基礎建立安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" /> that represents the SAML 2.0 security token.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SAML 2.0 安全性權杖的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: (The token returned is actually an instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken" />.)
trans-unit.target: (傳回的語彙基元實際上是 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken" /> 的執行個體)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The UPN to use to create the identity.
trans-unit.target: 要用來建立識別的 UPN。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> object using the specified User Principal Name (UPN).
trans-unit.target: 指定的使用者主要名稱 (UPN)，建立 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity that was created.
trans-unit.target: 已建立的 Windows 識別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="upn" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="upn" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Attribute" /> that contains the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 包含屬性之 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Attribute" /> 的列舉。

trans-unit.source: Builds an XML formatted string from a collection of SAML 2.0 attributes that represent the Actor.
trans-unit.target: 從表示行動之 SAML 2.0 屬性的集合中建置 XML 格式化字串。

trans-unit.source: A well-formed XML string constructed using the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用屬性所建構之語式正確的 XML 字串。

trans-unit.source: The string is of the form "\<Actor>\<Attribute name, ns>\<AttributeValue>...\</AttributeValue>, ...\</Attribute>...\</Actor>"
trans-unit.target: 字串的格式是 「\<動作項目 >\<屬性名稱、 ns >\<AttributeValue >...\</AttributeValue >，... \< /屬性 >...\</Actor > 」

trans-unit.source: The normalized value.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Constants.AuthenticationContextClasses" /> value matching a normalized value for a SAML authentication context class reference.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Constants.AuthenticationContextClasses" /> 值，此值符合 SAML 驗證內容類別參考的標準化值。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains one of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Constants.AuthenticationContextClasses" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含其中一個 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Constants.AuthenticationContextClasses" /> 常數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" /> that represents the SAML 2.0 security token (the token should be of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken" />) to be checked.
trans-unit.target: 表示要檢查之 SAML 2.0 安全性權杖 (權杖的型別應為 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />) 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the specified token already exists in the token replay cache; otherwise the token is added to the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果語彙基元重新執行快取中已存在指定的語彙基元，會擲回例外狀況，否則語彙基元會加入至快取。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior is to only check bearer tokens (tokens that do not have keys).
trans-unit.target: 預設行為是只檢查持有者權杖 （沒有索引鍵的語彙基元）。

trans-unit.source: The token replay cache is the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenReplayCache> object configured for this handler through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.Caches%2A> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration> object referenced through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 權杖重新執行快取是<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenReplayCache>物件設定為透過這個處理常式<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.Caches%2A>屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration>物件透過參考<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
-or-

There is no <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenReplayCache" /> configured under the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.Caches" /> property of the handler configuration (accessed through the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> property).
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式組態 (經由 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenReplayCache" /> 屬性存取) 的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.Caches" /> 屬性下未設定任何 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> cannot be cast as an instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> 無法轉換為 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the assertion associated with the token is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: 和此語彙基元相關聯的判斷提示的 ID 是<see langword="null" />或空白。

trans-unit.source: (The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken.Assertion" /> property of the token references a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion" /> that has an <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion.Id" /> property that references a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id" /> with a <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id.Value" /> property that is <see langword="null" /> or empty.)
trans-unit.target: (語彙基元的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityToken.Assertion" /> 屬性會參考具有 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion" /> 屬性 (其參考含有值為 <see langword="null" /> 或空白之 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion.Id" /> 屬性的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id" />) 的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id.Value" />)。

trans-unit.source: The token already exists in the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenReplayCache" />.
The claims identity object containing the desired UPN claim.
trans-unit.target: 包含所需 UPN 宣告的宣告識別物件。

trans-unit.source: Finds the UPN claim value in the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity" /> object for the purpose of mapping the identity to a <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 尋找指定之 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity" /> 物件中的 UPN 宣告值，以便用來將識別對應至 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the UPN claim value found.
trans-unit.target: 包含所找到 UPN 宣告值的字串。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves some scope encrypting credentials from the Scope object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 Scope 物件的某些範圍加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the token encrypting credentials.
Override this method to change the token encrypting credentials.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，以變更權杖加密認證。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials" /> that represents the token encrypting credentials.
The default implementation retrieves the encrypting credentials from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.EncryptingCredentials%2A> property of the `tokenDescriptor`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會擷取加密的認證從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.EncryptingCredentials%2A>屬性`tokenDescriptor`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The encrypting credentials retrieved from the token descriptor are asymmetric.
trans-unit.target: 擷取自語彙基元描述元的加密憑證是非對稱式。

trans-unit.source: The token descriptor.
Gets the credentials for signing the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於簽署判斷提示之認證。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials" /> that represents the credentials for signing the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於簽署判斷提示之認證的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials" />。

trans-unit.source: SAML2 assertions used as security tokens should be signed.
trans-unit.target: 應該簽署 SAML2 安全性權杖所做的判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation uses the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.SigningCredentials%2A> property of the `tokenDescriptor` to retrieve the credentials.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.SigningCredentials%2A>屬性`tokenDescriptor`擷取認證。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The token for which to return the expiration time.
trans-unit.target: 要為其傳回到期時間的權杖。

trans-unit.source: Returns the time until which the token should be held in the token replay cache.
trans-unit.target: 傳回權杖保存在權杖重新執行快取中的有效期間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the expiration time.
By default, this method returns the NotOnOrAfter of the SAML Condition if present.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會傳回 SAML 條件的 NotOnOrAfter，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: If that value does not exist, it returns the NotOnOrAfter of the first SubjectConfirmationData.
trans-unit.target: 如果該值不存在，它會傳回第一個 SubjectConfirmationData 的 NotOnOrAfter。

trans-unit.source: This function will never return a value further from the current time (<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>) than Configuration.TokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod.
trans-unit.target: 此函式永遠不會傳回值的目前時間之間的距離越遠 (<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>) 比 Configuration.TokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod。
